about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through mysterious terrains and dark jungles with "Traces of the Unknown." In this exploration RPG, you take on the role of a fearless, unknown explorer whose burning desire to unravel the unknown leads to an adventure that transcends the limits of the village he calls home.

key Features:

Fearless Exploration:

Immerse yourself in a complex world of whispering forests, wild creatures, and shadowy monsters. Explore hostile terrains, unravel intriguing dungeons, and discover hidden secrets.

Deep Narrative:

Uncover a compelling story where the protagonist's courage is tested by the constant dance with the unknown. Face challenges, unravel ancient myths, and write your own story.

Exceptional Art:

Stunning visuals depict a vibrant yet dangerous world where every shadow hides secrets, and every ray of light reveals mysteries. The immersive atmosphere will take you to a realm of beauty and mystery.

Challenging Gameplay:

Confront monsters with complex rationalities, solve intriguing puzzles, and collect ancient artifacts as you seek to unravel the secrets of creation. Every step is a dance with the unknown.

Unwritten Destiny:

Become the author of your own discoveries. The protagonist, guided by courage and determination, is ready to explore beyond the limits, challenging accepted wisdom and unveiling the mysteries surrounding the Unknown.

Get ready for a unique experience of exploration and mystery with "Traces of the Unknown." The unknown awaits, and only the bravest will dare to dance in the shadows to uncover its secrets.

name: Traces of the Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB de RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200MB de espaço disponível MB available space

short_description: "Traces of the Unknown" is a classic 2D action-adventure with RPG elements. Explore forests, deserts, caves, frozen environments, ancient dungeons, battle evil creatures, fierce and hungry animals, and unravel the ancient mysteries to discover the forgotten truth of the world.
